metadata.title: SilverCloseOut Rhodium Plated Sterling Silver Thin Stackable Womens Love Ring Thin Stacking Rings
features: Our Stackable Love Ring are made of Rhodium Plated 925 Sterling Silver. They are Nickel-free, Lead-free, Cadmium-free, and crafted with the highest quality.
Ring Dimensions: Ladies Stacking Love Ring Width: 2mm. Comes with a elegant gray padded jewelry box perfect to give as a gift for any loved one

Design: Sterling Silver Stacking Love Ring perfect to show the world what you're all about. We have Similar Rings that also say Hope, Love, Peace, Dream, Faith, Blessed Mix and match to make the look you like
Comes In a Black Gift Box

Recommended care instructions: To keep your silver jewelry looking new we recommend using a soft cotton cloth to gently wipe your .925 Sterling Silver Jewelry of deposited make-up and skin oils after each wearing. You can use silver cleaner or warm water with some baking soda to clean tarnished silver jewelry. To keep from tarnishing Avoid the use of chlorine bleach, and do not wear your Silver jewelry when you go into a swimming pool.
description: This Rhodium Plated Sterling Silver Thin Stackable Women's Love Word Ring will make a stylish addition to any jewelry collection and are perfect to match with your fashionable outfits. Made of Sterling Silver with fine detailing, All SilverCloseOut Jewelry is genuine Sterling Silver and stamped with 925. Rhodium Plated Sterling Silver Thin Stackable Women's Love Word Ring make a Great Gift for all Occasions; Mothers Day, Valentine's day, Birthday Gift- for Friend, sister, mother, wife, girlfriend, or grandmother. All Rhodium Plated Sterling Silver Thin Stackable Women's Love Word Ring are shipped in a small Gift Box and come with a 30-day Return policy. Recommended care instructions: To keep your silver jewelry looking new we recommend using a soft cotton cloth to gently wipe your .925 Sterling Silver Jewelry of deposited make-up and skin oils after each wearing. You can use silver cleaner or warm water with some baking soda to clean tarnished silver jewelry. To keep from tarnishing Avoid the use of chlorine bleach, and do not wear your Silver jewelry when you go into a swimming pool.
